The [lithology is from a global digital](https://www.clisap.de/fileadmin/B-Research/IA/IA5/LITHOMAP/) map which represent the different broad groups of parent materials. The lithology classes are: non- or semi-consolidated sediments, mixed consolidated sediments, silic-clastic sediments, acid volcanic rocks, basic volcanic rocks, complex of metamorphic and igneous rocks, and complex lithology.
